title: How many Grammy awards will Sabrina Carpenter win in 2025?
description: Sabrina Carpenter has 6 Grammy nominations in 2025: [Who is Sabrina Carpenter, the pop princess and Grammy best new artist nominee?](https://www.usatoday.com/story/entertainment/music/2025/01/17/who-is-sabrina-carpenter/77676303007/)

MusicIndustryProfessionalsMusicAwardAnal.initial_reasoning: Based on historical data of artists with similar profiles and nomination counts at the Grammy Awards, a common distribution can be observed: very few artists win more than two awards in a single ceremony unless they have achieved critical acclaim across multiple categories. For emerging pop artists with around 6 nominations, a typical outcome might be winning one or two awards. The historical win rate for similarly positioned artists is around 20%-30% win per nomination, which influences the base probabilities.

perspective_derived_factors.name: Current Popularity and Industry Impact
perspective_derived_factors.reasoning: Sabrina Carpenter's current popularity and impact on the music industry may influence the likelihood of winning multiple awards. Given her strong chart performances, endorsements, and media presence, her chances of winning more awards increase.

perspective_derived_factors.name: Category Strength
perspective_derived_factors.reasoning: The strength of each category she's nominated in matters. If competition is very strong, it's unlikely she will win in many categories, moderating the number of awards she might win.

MusicIndustryProfessionalsTalentRecognit.initial_reasoning: Sabrina Carpenter has 6 Grammy nominations in 2025. Historically, artists with multiple nominations often win at least one award, but it is not common for them to win more than half of their nominated categories. Based on historical Grammy data, winning one or two Grammys with multiple nominations is most typical. Thus, a base rate can be constructed: 0 or 1 win is somewhat conservative given her number of nominations; 2 wins is fairly common; 3 wins is less common; and winning half or more of her nominations (Greater than 3) is rare but possible.

perspective_derived_factors.reasoning: If her nominated albums or songs are perceived as artistically innovative or have received substantial critical acclaim, it increases the likelihood of winning across multiple categories.

news:
Here are the relevant news articles:

**Beyoncé, Kendrick, Sabrina and more: AP writers predict who will win at the 2025 Grammys**
The Associated Press' Maria Sherman and Jonathan Landrum Jr. predict the winners of the 2025 Grammys. They believe Beyoncé will win album of the year for 'Cowboy Carter', breaking the record for the most nominations for a single album. Sherman thinks Beyoncé will also win record of the year for 'Texas Hold 'Em'. Landrum predicts Kendrick Lamar will win song of the year for 'Not Like Us', which he calls a 'game-changing track'. They also predict Sabrina Carpenter will win best new artist, despite being on her sixth album. In the best dance/electronic album category, they think Charli xcx will win for 'BRAT'. The 67th Grammy Awards will be held on Sunday at Crypto.com Arena in Los Angeles. 
Original language: en
Publish date: January 27, 2025 07:14 PM
Source:[AP NEWS](https://apnews.com/article/2025-grammy-predictions-54b621a988fa1cb335b89a6a8ec1c131)

**Grammy 2025: Billie Eilish, Shakira, Sabrina Carpenter entre os artistas confirmados**
The 2025 Grammy Awards are just around the corner, and the preparations promise to be an unforgettable celebration. The event, scheduled for February 2nd, will be broadcast live on TNT at 22h (Brasília time) and will feature performances from some of the biggest names in music worldwide. Billie Eilish, Shakira, Sabrina Carpenter, and Charli XCX are among the confirmed artists, promising memorable moments for the audience. The Recording Academy has announced an impressive list of performances, including Sabrina Carpenter, who celebrates her 6 nominations, including Best New Artist. Charli XCX, nominated for Album of the Year for 'BRAT', will also take the stage for a show that promises to reflect her musical creativity. Billie Eilish and Shakira, global icons with multiple nominations, promise to bring unique performances that reaffirm their successful careers. In addition to the already established names, the event will also open space for new talents. Artists like Benson Boone, Chappell Roan, Doechii, RAYE, and Teddy Swims will make their debut on the Grammy stage. With diverse styles, these performances reflect the musical diversity and the Grammy's ability to highlight emerging artists alongside industry legends. This year's edition of the Grammy counts with a wide range of nominees representing the best of current music. Beyoncé leads the list with 11 nominations thanks to her album 'Cowboy Carter', including categories like Album of the Year, Song of the Year, and Record of the Year. Recognized for her constant innovation, the singer promises to dominate the award with her critically acclaimed and public acclaimed work. Another big star is the Brazilian Anitta, who conquered her second Grammy nomination. Her album 'Funk Generation' disputes in the category of Best Pop Latin Album, reinforcing her global presence. She won't be alone in representing Brazil; Hamilton de Holanda and Eliane Elias also compete in the category of Best Latin Jazz Album. This year, the Grammy will not only be about celebrating music, but also about making a difference. The Academy announced a fundraising initiative during the ceremony to support environmental preservation and help music professionals affected by the fires in Los Angeles. This solidarity action reinforces the Grammy's commitment to using its platform to positively impact the world. With star-studded performances, a diverse list of nominees, and a social impact initiative, the Grammy Awards 2025 promise to be one of the most memorable editions in history. The mix of established icons and new talents is a reminder of the transformative power of music and its ability to unite people around the world. Get ready for a night of surprises, emotion, and, of course, high-quality music. The Grammy 2025 is an event that no music lover can miss! 
Original language: pt
Publish date: January 27, 2025 06:25 PM
Source:[Terra](https://www.terra.com.br/diversao/musica/grammy-2025-billie-eilish-shakira-sabrina-carpenter-entre-os-artistas-confirmados,d9644fdf23e67b080025db8200cf028a1d6hzax6.html)

**2025 Grammy Awards: A Star-Studded Lineup and a Commitment to Giving Back**
The 2025 Grammy Awards will be held on February 2 at the Crypto.com Arena in Los Angeles, and will feature a star-studded lineup of performers, including Billie Eilish, Charlie XCX, Doja Cat, and Shakira. The nominees for the awards include a mix of veteran artists and new talent, with Billie Eilish leading the pack with seven nominations, including Record of the Year and Best Pop Solo Performance. Charlie XCX, who is nominated for eight awards, will perform hits like '360' and 'Apple'. Benson Boone, who is nominated for Best New Artist, has made a splash with his solo single 'Beautiful Things'. Chappell Roan, who is nominated for six awards, will showcase her success with her song 'Good Luck, Babe!', and will be joined by Sabrina Carpenter and Teddy Swims, who are both first-time nominees. Shakira, a three-time Grammy winner, will also perform and is nominated for Best Pop Latin Album. The ceremony will be hosted by comedian Trevor Noah, who has previously hosted the Grammys for four years. The awards will include categories such as Album of the Year, Song of the Year, Best New Artist, and Best Pop Solo Performance, among others. The Grammys will not only celebrate musical excellence but also raise funds for those affected by the recent wildfires in Los Angeles, with the Academy of Recording Arts and Sciences and MusiCares promising to donate over $3.2 million in aid.
Original language: ar
Publish date: January 27, 2025 09:22 AM
Source:[MTV Lebanon - Live Online TV](http://www.mtv.com.lb/news/%D8%A3%D8%AE%D8%A8%D8%A7%D8%B1_%D8%A7%D9%84%D9%86%D8%AC%D9%88%D9%85/1543087/%D9%83%D9%84-%D9%85%D8%A7-%D8%AA%D8%B1%D9%8A%D8%AF-%D9%85%D8%B9%D8%B1%D9%81%D8%AA%D9%87-%D8%B9%D9%86-%D8%AD%D9%81%D9%84-%D8%AA%D9%88%D8%B2%D9%8A%D8%B9-%D8%AC%D9%88%D8%A7%D8%A6%D8%B2--%D8%BA%D8%B1%D8%A7%D9%85%D9%8A-)

**Grammy Awards 2025: who will win, and who deserves to win? Featuring Beyoncé, Charli XCX and Doechii**
The Grammy Awards 2025 nominations have been announced, with a stacked list of talented artists. Beyoncé leads the pack with a record-breaking 11 nods, while pop's new holy trinity (Sabrina Carpenter, Chappell Roan, and Charli XCX) have received major nominations. However, despite the quality of the nominees, the awards often go to legacy acts or those with a high profile. The article predicts who will win in the major categories, versus who should win. For example, in the Song of the Year category, Billie Eilish's 'Birds of a Feather' is a clear winner, but the award will likely go to Beyoncé or Billie Eilish. In the Best New Artist category, Raye or Doechii should win, but Chappell Roan is likely to take home the prize. The article also highlights the controversy surrounding the Grammys, including the lack of diversity in the nominations and the favoritism shown to legacy acts.
Original language: en
Publish date: January 27, 2025 07:40 AM
Source:[standard.co.uk](https://www.standard.co.uk/culture/music/grammys-2025-who-should-win-beyonce-taylor-swift-sabrina-carpenter-b1202677.html)

**2025 Grammy Nominations: Complete List of Artists Nominated for Music's Biggest Honor**
The 2025 Grammy Awards, one of the most prestigious music events worldwide, has recently revealed the complete list of nominees. The wait is over! The nominees for the Grammys 2025 are here, and the list is generating a lot of buzz. After months of speculation about who would dominate the most competitive music competition, the Recording Academy of the United States has revealed the names, leaving us in total shock. Although some favorites made a triumphant entry, thanks to the overwhelming success of their work, the surprises did not lack. Unexpected twists and bold choices have sparked conversation, promising that this year's Grammys will be a true battle between music giants. Beyoncé and Taylor Swift made history by expanding their impressive records with 99 and 58 nominations, respectively. Additionally, Sabrina Carpenter and Chappell Roan celebrated double wins by not only receiving their first mentions, but also competing in the coveted four main categories. However, the absence of big names left a bitter taste. **Sabrina Carpenter Reflects On Receiving Best New Artist Grammy Nomination 10 Years Into Her Career**
